name: Be nice
description: During the whole instance, be actively nice with your mates

name: Are we the badies?
description: During the whole instance, be actively mean with your mates

name: I'm batman!
description: Any type of vocal communication shall be done in a gutural voice

name: R18
description: Glamour as in your naughtiest dreams

name: Furize
description: Glamour as a furize (Natural furize need to do it as well)

name: I'm singing in the rain
description: Any type of communication shall be done by singing, even textual

name: Pedant
description: Any type of communication shall be the more pedant possible

name: Apero time
description: Go grab a drink and make a toast with your mates

name: Santa
description: Before the instance, offer a small ingame gift to one of your mate

name: Good memories
description: At the end of the instance, take a fun group picture and share it with your friends

name: Hello, stranger
description: Before entering the instance, say hello to the first player you see and you don't already know
